person.persName: John B. Knight (Christian County, Kentucky, lawyer)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, lawyer. Georgia native. Married to Eliza Eleanor Bryan Knight in Christian County, Kentucky, on July 4, 1843. Father of Robert Knight, John B. Knight, Jr., Charles Knight, Carrie M. Knight, Kate B. Knight, Ida Knight, and Thomas Knight. Attorney in Christian County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Attorney in Christian County in 1860. Owned fifteen enslaved persons in Christian County in 1860.
